description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Rome, Italy. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Charming Rome Retreat near Villa Borghese with Daily Breakfast, Hotel Credit & Guaranteed Room Upgrade
hotels.description: Among eclectic furnishings and chic Italian design touches, soak up the vibrant charm of Italy's capital. A stylish retreat in the heart of Rome's fashion-forward Parioli district, this boutique hotel claims an excellent position for exploring, with Villa Borghese gardens and the bustling Via Veneto just steps away. Between enjoying pasta in Rome's famous piazzas, unwind at the light-filled Elio restaurant, where you can indulge in boozy brunches, sumptuous dinners and delectable wines. Start the day with a croissant and coffee at Cugino and return later for an expertly crafted nightcap. For culture and history enthusiasts, the Colosseum, Vatican City and the Pantheon are all within easy reach, while River Tiber invites leisurely strolls in between shopping and exploration.

hotels.title: Historic Five-Star Rome Escape on Iconic Via Giulia
hotels.description: Embrace Roman resplendence in the heart of the city’s historic Via Giulia with a five-star stay at Hotel Indigo Rome - St. George, an IHG Hotel, masterfully positioned amid endless galleries, upscale boutiques and artisanal cafes. After days exploring the Vatican, Piazza Navona and the Pantheon - all within easy strolling distance - soak the day away at the onsite Roman baths or enjoy aperitifs and antipasti at I Sofà Bar Restaurant & Roof Terrace and savour glorious Italian sunsets.

hotels.title: Five-Star Heritage Escape in the Heart of Rome
hotels.description: In the heart of the Italian capital, InterContinental Rome Ambasciatori Palace, an IHG Hotel features a seamless blend of contemporary design, five-star comfort and old-world glamour. This hotel is ideally placed to embark on a whirlwind tour of Rome: visit the Trevi Fountain just a 15-minute walk away or arrive at the bustling Piazza Navona in under 25 minutes on foot. After days spent exploring, return to the hotel and savour delicious Italian and American cuisine at the onsite Scarpetta NYC.

hotels.title: Five-Star Top-Rated Art Deco Luxury in the Heart of Rome
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the art, culture and history of Rome at the five-star Baglioni Hotel Regina. Part of the prestigious Leading Hotels of the World collection, this Art Deco gem sits on the vibrant Via Veneto. Here, the city's most iconic sights are at your fingertips; from the awe-inspiring Colosseum to the Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain. At the end of long Roman nights, return to the sumptuous sanctuary of Baglioni Hotel Regina. Brunello Bar and Restaurant invites you to try the flavours of the Mediterranean, expertly crafted by Executive Chef Luciano Sarzi Sartori. Awaken the senses with an espresso at Caffè Baglioni or wind down completely at the spa, where massage rooms, a sauna, Turkish bath and jacuzzi await.

hotels.title: Romantic Heritage Retreat in the Heart of Rome with Rooftop Terrace
hotels.description: Travel back to the romantic baroque period with a stay at the lavish Romanico Palace Luxury Hotel & SPA, an extravagant and elegant luxury hotel in the centre of Rome. Located in the historical heart of the ancient city, the grand traditional townhouse is perfectly positioned for days spent exploring the cobblestoned streets, passing by world-famous sights like the Spanish Steps, the Colosseum, Trevi Fountain and the Pantheon. Join the swathes of fashionistas shopping up a storm on the nearby Via Veneto and Via del Corso, or head to Barberini train station for a 10-minute ride to the Vatican. Marble floors, handpainted frescos, antique furniture and damask fabrics are standard across the rooms and suites of Romanico Palace, evoking a sumptuous sense of luxury and indulgence. Lose a few hours in the thermal bath-inspired spa, which offers a Turkish bath, Irish shower, sauna, hydromassage pool with salty water and a relaxation area. Enjoy one of the two bars available at the hotel: the lobby bar is open all year round or during spring, summer and autumn, venture to the panoramic rooftop terrace, where you can drink in breathtaking vistas of Rome.

hotels.title: Contemporary Rome City Escape with Rooftop Pool & Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Discover an oasis in the heart of Rome at this contemporary retreat, combining modern comforts with traditional Italian touches for an urban reprieve perfect after days spent exploring this historic city. Kick start your day at the onsite Uno Zero Uno restaurant, or venture out to discover local trattorias and bustling markets. Located beside the picturesque Trastevere district known for its lively laneways, restaurants and nightlife, this escape invites you to unwind after the day's adventures with its sparkling rooftop pool and jacuzzi, plus calming rooms and suites.

hotels.title: Modern Rome Escape with 900-Square-Metre Spa
hotels.description: The striking architecture, ancient history and culinary scene of Rome should be high on everyone's travel bucket list, and Crowne Plaza Rome St. Peter's, an IHG Hotel, is the perfect base. The famous Vatican Museum and the Sistine Chapel are just a short drive away - once you've had your fill of Michelangelo’s frescoes, return to your hotel and enjoy a dip in the swimming pool, a massage at the spa and indulge in mouthwatering meals and refreshing drinks at the four bars and restaurants.

hotels.title: Brand-New Rome Six Senses Hideaway near the Pantheon & Trevi Fountain
hotels.description: Take a remarkable trip back in time and immerse yourself in the history of the Eternal City with a luxurious stay at the stunning Six Senses Rome - a tranquil oasis hidden behind a UNESCO-listed facade overlooking Via del Corso. Admire the Roman-inspired architecture elegantly fused with modern accents of Travertine marble and oak wood details, then recharge within individually crafted rooms by renowned designer Patricia Urquiola. Feel the city buzz from an elevated vantage point - NOTOS rooftop terrace with sweeping city views - then slow things down at the calming Six Senses Spa and Roman baths or satisfy your hunger at BIVIUM. When adventure calls, visit the iconic landmarks on your doorstep, including Piazza Venezia, the Pantheon and the Colosseum.

hotels.title: Rome Five-Star Boutique Escape near Spanish Steps with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
hotels.description: Experience high-end opulence and five-star indulgence at the boutique The First Roma Arte. Ideally located in the heart of Rome, within walking distance of the Museo dell'Ara Pacis, Flaminio metro station and Spanish Steps, The First Roma Arte offers an ideal mix of art-influenced elegance and modern comforts, while maintaining impeccable hospitality and authentic Italian style. Guests can sharpen their appetite with tantalising Mediterranean flavours at the Michelin-starred Acquolina restaurant or savour a long lunch before sunset drinks at Acquaroof - delivering breathtaking views of Rome. Once you've had your fill, hit the streets and discover Rome's dramatic ruins, romantic culture and charismatic street life as you create your own lore exploring Italy’s hot-blooded capital. When you’re ready to retire for the night, there is nowhere better to lounge like an aristocrat than in your ultra-modern, spacious room or suite, all decorated with inspiring local art.
